name: Cue
description: Cue - 你的专属调研助理 / Your AI Research Assistant. A multi-agent deep research tool with persistent monitoring capabilities.

requiredEnvVars.name: CUECUE_API_KEY
requiredEnvVars.description: CueCue API Key for deep research (required)

optionalEnvVars.name: TAVILY_API_KEY
optionalEnvVars.description: Tavily API Key for news search and monitoring

optionalEnvVars.name: CHAT_ID
optionalEnvVars.description: Target chat/channel ID for notifications (auto-detected from OpenClaw)

externalEndpoints.purpose: Search API for monitoring (Tavily or QVeris)

persistentStorage.description: User data including tasks, monitors, logs, and secure credential storage

backgroundJobs.name: monitor-daemon
backgroundJobs.description: Checks active monitoring conditions every 30 minutes

securityFeatures.description: API keys stored only in ~/.cuecue/.env.secure, never in shared ~/.openclaw/.env
All sensitive files created with 600 permissions, directories with 700
Does not modify system paths or shared configuration

warnings: Creates isolated persistent storage at ~/.cuecue with restricted permissions
Runs background monitoring jobs using internal scheduler (no system cron)
Requires external API credentials stored securely in isolated location
Sends research data to external endpoints (cuecue.cn, optional tavily.com)
